nodes.text: Coruscant Institute for Medical Sciences was a medical institute operating on Coruscant during the Cold War. Around 3641 BBY it co-hosted a lecture by Doctor Tan Kirin of the Corellian Science Academy in conjunction with the Republic Medical Journal.
Coruscant Institute for Medical Sciences is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic in the letter Elara Dorne sends to Trooper if the player pursued the romance option.
